page.title: 09Leisure In Rufforth.
page.content: Most people in{Rufforth}like to do {Gardening}in their spare time. Others like to do more unusual things in their spare time like photography D.I.Y.(do it yourself)also windsurf River cruising and caravanning.Some people don't have any spare time. {Gardening}is the{most popular}of them all.45 people like doing that out of 171 people.The{second popular}is{ {reading.}36 people like doing it.One person likes to fly model planes and build different models.Another person likes doing carpentry work.{Rufforth {park}is near Rufforth.It is used for {Leisure}.It is where riders and horses take part in show jumping events.There is room for spectators.There are three outdoor arenas and one indoor arena. There is a shop which sells things you need for a horse.
